General.Name: Top Systems-L
General.Description: Top Ramdor Systems & Computers Co. (1990) Ltd develops, markets, and sells software products and services in the field of process management, surveys, tasks, business resources, product life management, projects, and maintenance in Israel and internationally. It also provides computerized services for the management and production of work plans, budgets, costs, cash flow, tenders, liabilities, contracts, and payments, as well as provides consulting, assimilation, and training services for the products. In addition, it offers outsourcing services for technological personnel in the field of software development and computing services. Top Ramdor Systems & Computers Co. (1990) Ltd was incorporated in 1990 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.
